cancelAuction(uint256).details: Allows the seller to cancel and retrieve their NFT ONLY IF the auction has ended AND no bids were placed.

params._initialFeeRecipient: The address of the treasury that will receive fees.

createAuction(address,uint256,address,ui.details: Creates a new auction for an ERC721 token. The seller must have approved this contract to transfer the NFT.

finalizeWithProof(uint256,address,uint25.details: Finalizes an auction, paying the seller and fee recipient. Requires a 'proof' which, in this stub, is just an owner check.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

placeBid(uint256,uint256).details: Places a simple plaintext bid. The bidder must have approved this contract to transfer the stableToken.

refundLosers(uint256).details: Refunds all losing bids and any remaining deposit from the winner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFeeBps(uint256).details: Sets the platform fee (in BPS). Only owner.

setFeeRecipient(address).details: Sets the new treasury address that receives fees. Only owner.

submitEncryptedBid(uint256,bytes,uint256.details: Submits an encrypted bid and a deposit (for FHE). The bidder must approve the stableToken deposit.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
